numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that there are not many people of color in baseball.
2. I noticed that other sports have more people of color than baseball.
3. I wonder if discrimination causes this situation.
4. I wonder if people of color do not want to play baseball.
5. I wonder if people of color prefer other sports to baseball.
6. I noticed that coaches of color are 40% or less.
7. I wonder if discrimination causes this situation.
8. I wonder if there are not enough coaches of color.
